differences.actualValue: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you're calling to cancel a delivery, is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I see that you're on your way to the pick up location. So I can better understand why you'd like to cancel, are you having trouble finding the store, <break time="400ms"/> is the location too far, <break time="400ms"/> or, having problem parking your car? You can also say, it is something else.</speak>

text: <speak>I see that you're on your way to the pick up location. So I can better understand why you'd like to cancel, are you having trouble finding the store, <break time="400ms"/> is the location too far, <break time="400ms"/> or, having problem parking your car? You can also say, it is something else.</speak>

agentUtterance.text: <speak>I see that you're on your way to the pick up location. So I can better understand why you'd like to cancel, are you having trouble finding the store, <break time="400ms"/> is the location too far, <break time="400ms"/> or, having problem parking your car? You can also say, it is something else.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I'm sorry you're having trouble finding the store, and I know how frustrating this can be. Please call the store directly for help. Some locations also have multiple businesses sharing the same space. If this is the case, go to the address in your app, and the staff at that location will help you. If you have already called the store, you can say, I already called them.<break time="750ms"/> </speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>I'm sorry you're having trouble finding the store, and I know how frustrating this can be. Please call the store directly for help. Some locations also have multiple businesses sharing the same space. If this is the case, go to the address in your app, and the staff at that location will help you. If you have already called the store, you can say, I already called them.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>I'm sorry you're having trouble finding the store, and I know how frustrating this can be. Please call the store directly for help. Some locations also have multiple businesses sharing the same space. If this is the case, go to the address in your app, and the staff at that location will help you. If you have already called the store, you can say, I already called them.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
